document_data.name: Irlin Stonestable
document_data.mainbody: '''Irlin Stonestable''' was a noble in [[Cormyr]] and lord of the [[Stonestable]] noble house.
document_data.Personality: Lord Stonestable was grim-hearted, but steadfast.
document_data.Relationships: Per [[Arclath Delcastle]], Irlin Stonestable ran with a circle that included the lords [[Broryn Windstag]], [[Delasko Sornstern]], [[Mellast Ormblade]], [[Kathkote Dawntard]], [[Sacrast Handragon]], and [[Marlin Stormserpent]]. He was one of the more formidable lords there.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|364|34}}
document_data.History:
He was with Marlin when Broryn Windstag's posse got kicked out of the [[Dragonriders Club]], and went to [[Stormserpent Towers]] afterwards.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|266-267|25}}

In the calamitous aftermath of the [[Council of the Dragon]] days after, he met with Broryn Windstag at [[Staghaven House]], where the rest of their faction slowly turned up. Lord Stonestable was incredulous at the word on the street being that Cormyr was on the verge of civil war.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|124-125|13}} While he was there, the moot was joined by [[Traevyn Illance]], Marlin Stormserpent, and briefly visited by [[Osbur]].{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|132-135|14}}
